name: The Bracelets of Eternal Fire
data: It increases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
